description: Defines a relation between two elements.

id.description: Identity of the object; used for referencing

elementA.description: References the first linear element in an oriented relation.

elementB.description: References the second linear element in an oriented relation.

isOnOriginOfElementA.description: Determines if the position of the topological element A in a relation is the origin of element A.

isOnOriginOfElementB.description: Determines if the position of the topological element B in a relation is the origin of element B.
